string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: ILUNA Institute of the Mystics 2nd Year. An angelic maiden who descended from Heaven to observe mankind. Her gentle appearance hides a rather mischievous disposition.
A Phantom Thief from the future with exceptional stealth. He’s a free yet mischievous spirit who is hard to pin down.
ILUNA Institute of the Mystics 2nd Year. A celestial born from a Supernova long ago. His memories are faint, but his wish to spread happiness across the universe remains strong.
XSOLEIL Institute of Infinity 1st Year. Enforcer of the Student Council who is true to himself. He’s a delinquent turned disciplinarian, so can order really be expected?
A sky dragon who came from the heavens closest to the sun. She has the kindness and receptiveness that makes the light of a sunny day fall equally on all.
A blue bird fluttering in the heavens. She sings a love song for the souls of the living.
A mermaid who spends her time with tropical fish in the sea of coral reefs. Has a heart as clear and pure as the calm and beautiful sea.
A Cyborg from the future with unparalleled strength. His body is partly cold steel, and who’s to say if he has a heart?
XSOLEIL Institute of Infinity 2nd Year. Counselor of the Student Council who greatly wishes to care for people. He can absorb the pain of others, at the cost of his own wellbeing.
A Novelist from the past who seems somewhat closed-off. When an idea for his next work sparks, he becomes a completely different person.
XSOLEIL Institute of Infinity 3rd Year. Vice President of the Student Council who is as fashionable as she is dependable. She specializes in glamouring as anyone she touches.
ILUNA Institute of the Mystics 1st Year. A cheerful first year with a chaotic edge. His primary goal in life is to always have fun and make others laugh.
A Mafia boss from the past with a slight temper. Always down for a fight, whether it’s to show-off his own strength or to protect the weak.
ILUNA Institute of the Mystics 1st Year. A doll who was turned human after centuries of loneliness. Easily influenced by her surroundings, her actions are often strange, but she means well.
XSOLEIL Institute of Infinity 2nd Year. Event coordinator of the Student Council who is an exorcist by night. She casts out ghosts and demons with her trusty umbrella.
A monster cat creeping through hell. A bit aggressive, but maybe she just needs some attention.
A Detective from the past known for his eccentric nature. As a natural-born genius, he solved countless mysteries with his keen deduction skills.
A nine-tailed fox that presides over the heavens. She wishes for the joy of all souls on the long journey.
A penguin who spent much time alone in the frosty sea. Has charm and complex emotions as the stormy sea.
A fairy who lived in a lush forest. Supple like a flower in the breeze, cheerful and optimistic.
A ghost wandering in hell. The more she thinks of her beloved, the more she becomes sad and haunted.
ILUNA Institute of the Mystics 3rd Year. A deadly alien prince from another world. He has resolved to conquer Earth, using his unique sound.
A rose maiden raised in a beautiful garden. Pretty as a rose in a vase, but a little sharp to the touch.
ILUNA Institute of the Mystics 3rd Year. An elegant and mature Enchantress. Her captivating beauty glows as radiant as her scarlet staff.
A sky dragon descended from the moon. She has a gentle heart hidden underneath her mischievous nature, like the glow of the moon on a cloudy night.
A sorcerer from the past with mysterious abilities. Though kind-hearted, he can call down a malediction upon those who wrong him.
An Officer from the future with a straightforward attitude. He’s reliable in a pinch despite being rough around the edges.
A Psychic from the future with enigmatic powers. Though he appears somewhat shy, strange things follow wherever he goes.
XSOLEIL Institute of Infinity 3rd Year. President of the Student Council who is veiled in charisma and mystery. He can look into your very soul and read your future.
A Demon from the past who held great power. Though confident in his superhuman abilities, he looks after those who are loyal to him.
XSOLEIL Institute of Infinity 1st Year. Treasurer of the Student Council who came from the future. She hides her loneliness with a self-imposed goal of preventing the apocalypse.
